title: Installation
content:
Installation Guide # To install this project, follow these steps:
Install Hugo conda install -c conda-forge hugo Clone the Repository git clone https://github.com/<user>/<user>.github.io.git Run the Hugo Server hugo server -D

title: Usage
content:
How to Use # Once installed, run:
hugo new site my-site cd my-site hugo server -D
